title: Raceonsucced
author: Raceonsucced
content: now there are many suicides, especially because the economy that is still unstable makes them even more stressed.but actually, apart from stress, what makes someone think about ending their own life? What do you think

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: Quote from: Raceonsucced on January 20, 2023, 07:40:41 AMnow there are many suicides, especially because the economy that is still unstable makes them even more stressed.but actually, apart from stress, what makes someone think about ending their own life? What do you thinkApart from the economy, if one grows in a society that see's nothing wrong in ending your own life, someone can easily nurse that thought. For some other people, things are hard for them, they wonder what the point of living is, they become tired and decide to end their life since their situation is looking hopeless. Some others cannot face and handle shame, failure, disappointment, heartbreak and disgrace, so ending their life becomes the better option, their escape route.

comments.author: Minecache
comments.body: Quote from: Raceonsucced on January 20, 2023, 07:40:41 AMnow there are many suicides, especially because the economy that is still unstable makes them even more stressed.but actually, apart from stress, what makes someone think about ending their own life? What do you thinkThe economy is just a part of life, we humans each have a situation and face many different bad things that lead to negative thinking, such as love, work pressure… there are too many reasons for a person to commit suicide. For those who are contemplating suicide, I think it is possible that they have been through inner torment as well as have endured something so bad that there is no better way. Suicide is evasion of human responsibility, not liberation.

comments.author: Tallupooh
comments.body: I think why people think about suicide he wants peace so badly. and it all starts with a stressed, confused or heartbroken mind that is also similar to stress.a person who is desperate as if there is no enlightenment in life in the future, will think suicide is the right choice, because he feels that it is useless to live anymore.but remember, everything needs a process, no matter how bitter life is, stay optimistic in living life. because if we are not optimistic then life will fall apart and have no chance. so always be grateful for all the gifts from God, and think well then look at the people below us so we can be grateful.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Raceonsucced on January 20, 2023, 07:40:41 AMnow there are many suicides, especially because the economy is still unstable makes them even more stressed.but, apart from stress, what makes someone think about ending their own life? What do you thinkHopelessness is the main reason for suicide. When people feel that they have no reason to live they simply think of ending their lives. Most people commit suicide because economic hardship has made them debtors. Some of them have lost so much money because of business failure and most of these funds were borrowed. Some of them prefer to die than go to jail. The highest rate of suicide among youths in my country now is heartbreak or relationship problems. When these young people are dumped by their lovers they become angry. We have had cases where they kill their ex-lover and commit suicide.For me committing suicide is not an option. No kind of economic challenge can make me commit suicide. Because I know I can overcome any challenge I am going through. Someone has gone through what you are experiencing and overcome it.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: Raceonsucced on January 20, 2023, 07:40:41 AMnow there are many suicides, especially because the economy that is still unstable makes them even more stressed.but actually, apart from stress, what makes someone think about ending their own life? What do you thinkLoosing hope when life turns your back against the wall, wjen there's nothing to fall back on a d all hope seems gone, getting frustrated with life situations when it occurs that the more strike the more the failures, wjen there's nothing to show forth as tangible results towards every efforts you're giving in an attempt to get back on track but all ends in grid luck, but there's no excuse one can ever make or give as reason to committing suicide because that's not the solution but rather cut life short, one must learn to encourage himself no matter the circumstances because there's always hope for a better tomorrow only if we never give up.

comments.author: Swordsoffreedom
comments.body: Quote from: Raceonsucced on January 20, 2023, 07:40:41 AMnow there are many suicides, especially because the economy that is still unstable makes them even more stressed.but actually, apart from stress, what makes someone think about ending their own life? What do you thinkLosing faith in life and having no motivation to hold them back, or perhaps because they are too much to endure the oppression, they will choose death to free themselves. What is alarming now is that the suicide rate occurs mostly among young people, young people with impulsive thoughts.Last year, a tragic case of suicide happened in my country for a student, just because his parents forced him to study too much, he chose to commit suicide by jumping from a building. As parents, everyone wants their children to study hard to become good people, but in his position, he thinks that he does not live for himself but lives for his parents, his youth and impulsive thinking have caused trauma to an entire family.

comments.author: Gyfts
comments.created_time: January 20, 2023, 03:47:16 PMLast edit: January 22, 2023, 02:34:25 AM by Gyfts
comments.body: Some form of mental illness that's conditioned environmentally. Doesn't seem likely to me that someone would be genetically disposed to suicide or clinical depression. Evolutionarily, people more prone to suicide would not have reproduced and passed along these genetic deficiencies. Seems to me it's more of a recent phenomenon in human history.Plus suicide is more common in the developed world with a higher standard of living than it is in third world countries with extreme poverty and the treatment is take a depressed person and pump them up with as many SSRIs as the dosing will allow and hope for the best. It's possible SSRI's might be contributing to the suicide rate but who knows.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: If life was a video game, suicide would be like the rage quit. I’ve seen plenty of people throw down controllers and shit off their machines because what was supposed to be fun turned out to be upsetting instead. I’m sure a lot of people feel that way about life. They set out to do good and have fun, but then maybe through circumstances they couldn’t have foreseen, end up in misery. Maybe they feel like the bad outweighs the good and they don’t want to continue anymore. It’s easy to feel that way when things are going bad. You just need to remember that things get better.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: There are many reasons why some people consider suicide because it is not what bothers you that bothers other people but most things are like family treats, the way life turns down to him / her and might think of he can't make it or feel like the suicide will be the best thing that will make him have peace of mind, also forget about how the world treats him /her will be The best way, which is why some people go ahead and do whatever comes to mind, but I don't think suicide is the best way because every human being has a chance as long as he or she is still alive.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Suicide is being committed intentionally and unintentionally, people who commits suicide intentionally might have been frustrated with life problems and challenges thinking all hope is lost, if they don't have anyone to counsel them or show them love,they think suicide will be the best option to end all their trauma.For those who commits suicide unintentionally, are carried away with too much excitement in whatever fun they were having,or being too careless in dangerous activities. Some persons that are into drug sometimes can take overdose and from there he can pass out unknowingly to him.

comments.author: o48o
comments.created_time: January 21, 2023, 09:25:32 PMLast edit: January 22, 2023, 10:46:43 PM by o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Raceonsucced on January 20, 2023, 07:40:41 AMnow there are many suicides, especially because the economy that is still unstable makes them even more stressed.but actually, apart from stress, what makes someone think about ending their own life? What do you thinkThere are ton of reasons: Depression. Constant physical pain from illness that isn't going away, and just might get worse and kill you.Mental health problems. Money problems, fear of losing everything and living in the streets. Fear of the enemy combatant torturing you. Losing everyone you love. Loneliness. Gender identity and pressure from society makes you seem like a failure. There's no meaning in life.Honestly i could just go on, but it would get way darker. World is a scary place and not everyone has same cards to play it with. I choose not to do it because my life is pretty good and i would die anyway at one point and i can see no reason to speed it up. But i totally understand people who want to end theirs.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Suicide is about mental or emotional pain which becomes so unbearable that death turns into an "option" to make the pain stop.It is similar to the feeling of sorrow one has when losing someone loved but the pain does not go away as time passes, it stays and it slowly eats away the will to live of people, it is the hopelessness which leads people to want to end themselves.I have friends who have told me about their suicidal thoughts, and I empathize with them, since it is a serious matter...

comments.author: Popkon6
comments.body: People grow up in a society apart from economy where they have to grow up with insults and various insults.  People choose to commit suicide for various reasons. When life hits the wall at the end of time, nothing works for people to think with their conscience.  People choose to commit suicide to erase emotional moments and this is observed only in young men and women.  People get into a position of committing crimes where they don't have time to look back and thus end up committing suicide.

comments.author: Phyna4
comments.body: There are many factors that can contribute to someone making the decision to commit suicide, including mental health conditions such as depression, anxiety, or post-traumatic stress disorder; substance abuse; a history of trauma or abuse; a recent loss or change; feelings of hopelessness or helplessness; and a lack of support or sense of belonging. It's important to note that suicide is a complex issue.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Raceonsucced on January 20, 2023, 07:40:41 AMnow there are many suicides, especially because the economy that is still unstable makes them even more stressed.but actually, apart from stress, what makes someone think about ending their own life? What do you thinkThe major factor is mental healthOnce your psychological state is messed up, everything comes crumbling down. I say this because I was in such a situation at one time. The situation was so challenging and as a young man who was growing up there was no one to talk to so my mental health went in to a mess, and before I realized, I was hopeless and thinking life is not worth fighting for. Please take note that I am one person who always thought that suicide was something so stupid.What helped me is one someone old enough talked to me. Everything changed, and I started living positively, but if that person hadn't talked to me, I don't know where I would be right now. I also learned that not to blame people who take their own lives.

comments.author: rahmad2nd
comments.body: There are many factors that can lead a person to attempt suicide. including, namely, there are psychological disorders, use of alcohol and narcotics, personality crises, physical illnesses, genetic factors, family conditions. some researchers say, suicide attempts are carried out because of the loss factor, a means to express negative emotions that are felt, this is caused by depression that appears irreducible to the ego. furthermore, those who attempt suicide tend not to think systematically, as a result of the depression that developed before the suicide attempt took place. people who decide to end their life, are not in the good mental capacity to make that decision.When someone has thoughts of ending their life, there is a disturbance in the thought process that often occurs when someone is depressed. so, basically cases like this have in common, that those who want to attempt suicide, they think suicide is the best solution to overcome the problem.well, happy those who are free from mental illness.

comments.author: Lordhermes
comments.body: Truism People throughout the world are going through a lot. The results of good deeds can be problematic. Helping others today equates to bringing problems on yourself.The world is filled with evil, and true love is vanishing day by day. Nobody genuinely cares about anyone else's health or wellness. Everyone is working to stay alive. These are a few of the causes of the daily suicides that occur. However, my dear friends, suicide ought to be the final resort. We must vehemently oppose suicide and all other forms of it.
